articles.title: Lifting lockdown for all but the most vulnerable would see more than 100,000 die, Government scientist warns - Telegraph.co.uk
articles.description: Professor Neil Ferguson says young and healthy returning to work while vulnerable remain shielded would still see increase in deaths
articles.content:
But Prof Ferguson, one of the group's members, suggested some of the options which may be considered would mean significant numbers of fatalities because it is impossible to safely isolate the most vulnerable.

articles.title: Coronavirus: 'Definite trend' for falling hospital numbers as deaths hit April low - Sky News
articles.description: There were 413 coronavirus-linked hospital deaths reported on Sunday - the smallest numerical increase since last month.
